title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.2 - Payment of tolls
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 302.2 - Payment of tolls

State Regulations

No traffic shall be permitted to cross the bridge except upon
the payment of such tolls and other charges as may from time to time be
prescribed by the authority. It is unlawful for any person to refuse to pay, or
to evade or attempt to evade the payment of such tolls or other
charges. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
302.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
